resources.string: This is artists activity, here name of artists will be displayed in future ! :)
This is latest albums activity, here we will show the latest albums ! :)
This is the latest songs activity, here we will show the latest songs ! :)
This is random activity, this activity will show any song randomly ! :)
This is now playing activity, this activity will be responsible for showing the song that is currently running ! :)
Here Google Payment API will be used, we can find more about this API here
